meanings.definition: The state or quality of being copious.
meanings.sent1: Her copiousnesses of kindness made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: The copiousnesses of books in the library amazed the students.
meanings.sent3: The copiousnesses of snacks at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: His copiousnesses of ideas flowed like a river during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The copiousnesses of stars in the night sky took her breath away.

meanings.definition: A large quantity or number of something.
meanings.sent1: The copiousnesses of flowers in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the copiousnesses of gifts she received on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The copiousnesses of bubbles in the bath made it look like a foam party.
meanings.sent4: The copiousnesses of raindrops falling created a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The copiousnesses of colors in the painting made it stand out from the rest.
